events.message: The applicant has submitted the mortgage loan application to purchase a new house in the city.
Reviewed the submitted forms and documents; categorised the loan as a mortgage for a residential property purchase.
Assigned loan officer Sarah Johnson to handle the mortgage loan application and assist the applicant further.
Performed an initial assessment of applicant’s financials, creditworthiness, and property details for the mortgage loan.
Requested additional documents including property appraisal report and proof of income to support mortgage application.
Applicant provided all requested documentation promptly, including appraisal and up-to-date financial statements.
Credit report and score reviewed; applicant has a strong credit history suitable for mortgage lending criteria.
Risk analysis performed considering loan amount, property value, and applicant’s repayment capacity.
Presented a mortgage loan offer including terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule tailored for the applicant.
Applicant reviewed the mortgage loan offer and requested clarification on early repayment options.
Escalated the case to senior underwriting due to applicant’s questions requiring policy exceptions.
Mortgage loan approved by senior underwriting after confirming all criteria and applicant eligibility.
Funds disbursed to seller’s account as per mortgage agreement, completing the purchase transaction.
Followed up with applicant to ensure satisfaction with loan process and answer post-funding inquiries.
Closed the mortgage loan application file after successful funding and post-approval follow-up activities.
